dcterms:description: The SUMO platform is used for simulating urban mobility, allowing for the evaluation of adaptive traffic signal control tasks.

dcterms:description: The StarCraft II Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) provides a fully-cooperative environment for agents to learn and compete against an opposing team.
